entityId.localType: ISMAPNG Archives Bathurst Repository Series Number

biogHist.abstract: This series of records was created by St Joseph's Orphanage, Bathurst (Girls' Home). The series is made up of two volumes, arranged alphabetically by surname, containing originals and photocopies of approximately three hundred and twenty assorted Certificates of Birth, Baptism, First Holy Communion and Confirmation of former residents of the orphanage.
biogHist.p: Application for access must be made, in writing, to the Archivist, providing personal identification documents to establish the right to access information. Physical access to the records is not permitted due to their fragility and the need to protect the confidentiality of information concerning other persons. Information will be forwarded by mail.

The Certificates are managed by the Institute of the Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea (ISMAPNG). ISMAPNG formed out of the consolidation of 14 of the 17 congregations of the Institute of the Sisters of Mercy in Australia, and from the region of Papua New Guinea. This included the Bathurst Congregation, which ran the St Josephs' Orphanage from 1867 until it closed down in 1975.

The dates on the records in this Series are for the years 1914 to 1970 inclusive. The records were passed on to the Sisters of Mercy Archives, Bathurst after the closure of the orphanage in 1975. The records contain information including: Name, Parents' names and address, Date and Place of Birth, Date and Place of Baptism/First Holy Communion/ Confirmation, By Whom, Name(s) of Sponsor(s).

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives, Bathurst Repository (2011 - )

descriptiveNote.p: The ISMAPNG Archives, Bathurst Repository holds the Certificates, St Josephs' Orphanage, Bathurst.
